Back To Recipes

recipe

Get out the following ingredients:

water 6 cup
ziti 16 ounce
olive oil 1 Tbsp
garlic clove 4 unit
red onion 1 unit
italian sausage 16 ounce
spaghetti sauce 16 ounce
ricotta cheese 15 ounce
mozzarella cheese 8 ounce
parmessan cheese 3 ounce
Show Ingrendients

Estimated Time: 50 Minutes

Recipe:

Put 6 cups water (1.5 quarts) in pot
Boil water on heat 7 with lid (Takes 10 minutes)
Put in 16 ounces ziti in water
Put in 1 Tbsp olive oil in water
| Put sauce pan on heat 7 on another burner (Takes 3 minutes)
mince 4 garlic cloves red onion
Put 16 ounces italian sausage into pan
| Cook sausage (Takes 5 minutes)
Put in garlic clove and red onion
| Cook pan mixture (Takes 5 minutes)
Preheat oven to 350
Put in italian seasoning into pan mixture
Cook pan mixture (Takes 1 minute)
Put 16 ounces spaghetti sauce into pan mixture
Cook pan mixture (Takes 1 minute)
Drain noodles
Spread a thin layer of the sauce in the bottom of a 9x13-inch casserole pan
Dot the surface with half the 8 ounces ricotta cheese
Put a spoonful of sauce into the pasta, stir, and then add the pasta into the casserole.
Pour the rest of the sauce over the pasta, dot the remaining 7 ounces ricotta cheese over the pasta, and sprinkle 8 ounces mozzarella cheese 3 ounces parmessan cheese on top.
At this point you could refrigerate or freeze, or bake
Bake in oven until light brown and cheese is melted (Takes 25 minutes)
